thread.section_title: Eagle Optics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eagle Optics | www.eagleoptics.com | 2 of 110
thread.title: glenn

author: glenn
title: glenn
text: there are plenty of places to buy optics. eagle optics is incredibly helpful with selection. prices are fair. they have a generous return policy. they handle their in-house warrantees very well. their intention seems to be geared towards building long term customer satisfaction. i've dealt with eagle for many years now as an individual customer and for school optics. invoices total thousands of dollars. every transaction has been handled thoughtfully. communication is excellent.
